UniprotID	O15498
Accession	O15498;B4DR94;Q53F01;Q6FGU9;Q6IB15
EntryName	YKT6_HUMAN
ProteinName	Synaptobrevin homolog YKT6 (EC 2.3.1.-)
GeneName	YKT6
Length	198
Function	Vesicular soluble NSF attachment protein receptor (v-SNARE) mediating vesicle docking and fusion to a specific acceptor cellular compartment. Functions in endoplasmic reticulum to Golgi transport; as part of a SNARE complex composed of GOSR1, GOSR2 and STX5. Functions in early/recycling endosome to TGN transport; as part of a SNARE complex composed of BET1L, GOSR1 and STX5. Has a S-palmitoyl transferase activity.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol; Cytoplasmic vesicle membrane; Golgi apparatus membrane
